badge@sherwood.name: badge
badge@sherwood.desc[0]: The sheriff's badge is here stained with his blood.

point@sherwood.name: point
point@sherwood.examine: It's a knife.  What did you expect a exclamation point?
point@sherwood.desc[0]: A sharp point has been left here.

beer@sherwood.name: beer
beer@sherwood.examine: To bad you don't have a tap!
beer@sherwood.desc[0]: A keg of beer sits here waiting to be killed.

stick@sherwood.name: stick
stick@sherwood.desc[0]: There is a stick here on the ground.

sticker@sherwood.name: sticker
sticker@sherwood.desc[0]: A Pig-Sticker is here, tempting you to pick it up.

clip@sherwood.name: clip
clip@sherwood.examine: A paper clip in the middle of Sherwood forest?
clip@sherwood.desc[0]: A paper clip can barely be seen in the grass.

quiver@sherwood.name: quiver
quiver@sherwood.desc[0]: A very well fashioned quiver lies here waiting for someone to pick it up.

ppipe@sherwood.name: PPipe
ppipe@sherwood.examine: &+GWhat would you do with a full pipe?
ppipe@sherwood.desc[0]: &+GA small full pipe has been dropped here.

pipe@sherwood.name: Pipe
pipe@sherwood.examine: &+GWhat would you put in a pipe?
pipe@sherwood.desc[0]: &+GA small pipe has been dropped here.

brush@sherwood.name: brush
brush@sherwood.examine: It's brush, what did you expect to find a sword or something?

ironwood@sherwood.name: ironwood
ironwood@sherwood.desc[0]: The infamous Ironwood Sword lies here, quivering ready to kill.

parry@sherwood.name: parry
parry@sherwood.examine: It is a sturdy staff that could do some damage if used right.
parry@sherwood.desc[0]: Little John's parry staff sits here.

volume@sherwood.name: volume
volume@sherwood.examine:
Blind is an attack spell for tournaments.  If you are blind,
then you will not be able to cast magic spells, you will not
see anywhere that you move to, any damage you would inflict
is reduced by 2/3, and any damage you would receive is 
increased by 3/2. Blind takes 10 mana, and is certain for 8 knowledge.
Cure and dumb are possible defenses.
volume@sherwood.desc[0]: &+YVolume XV&N of the &+WBook of Knowledge&N lies here.

necklace@sherwood.name: necklace
necklace@sherwood.desc[0]: A beautiful necklace lies at your feet.

greenleaf@sherwood.name: GreenLeaf
greenleaf@sherwood.examine: &+GIt's quite ripe, and gives off a very strong odor.
greenleaf@sherwood.desc[0]: &+GA large, funky smelling leaf is here.

sherwood21@sherwood.title: Near Waterfall
sherwood21@sherwood.description:
You continue along the path.  You hear the rush of falling water to
the west.  To the north runs a beaten path.  It is probably beaten down for
some reason.

sherwood29@sherwood.title: Under the Birch Trees
sherwood29@sherwood.description:
You stand under many birch trees that block out the sun.  The path
continues to the north.

sherwood20@sherwood.title: Rainbow Waterfall
sherwood20@sherwood.description:
You are standing in a small stream just below a breath-taking 
waterfall.  The spray off the falls causes a beautiful rainbow to stretch 
across the river.  You can not imagine a more beautiful place.  Jagged rocks 
cover the bed of the stream just below the falls.  The stones become smoother 
and polished further down stream from the continuous wearing of the water.  
The grass is short, soft, and green, perfect for a picnic with your 
sweatheart.

sherwood31@sherwood.title: Under the Oak Trees
sherwood31@sherwood.description:
You stand under many oaks trees that block out the sun.  The path
continues to the north.

sherwood10@sherwood.title: Path Straightens
sherwood10@sherwood.description:
The path straightens.  You look across the river and see something far
off in the distance.  It looks very interesting.  You shiver with anticipation
of the time when you will be able to explore the region across the river.

sherwood34@sherwood.title: Clearing
sherwood34@sherwood.description:
You have reached a clearing at the edge of the woods.  You are quite
greatful that you have exited the forest and can rest from your many battles.
Thick brush cirles around the clearing keeping out any stray animals that 
wander into this area.

hut4@sherwood.title: Ramshackle Hut
hut4@sherwood.description:
As you enter, the ceiling beam slips, turns, and falls on you.  It crushes
your chest and you die.

sherwood13@sherwood.title: Intersection
sherwood13@sherwood.description:
You have come to an intersection.  You must now, once again, choose
your fate.  Will you take the route to the north?  Or take the route to the
west?  Or will you chicken out and take the route to the east, back from where
your cowardly heart came from?  You must now choose.

sherwood18@sherwood.title: Near the End
sherwood18@sherwood.description:
You are nearing the end of the road.  Your life long dreams lie just 
ahead.  Money, power, love, fame, and happiness are waiting for you.  Your 
ticket to all of this is just north of here.

sherwood9@sherwood.title: Bend in the Road
sherwood9@sherwood.description:
The path turns north here.  There is a rapidly running river to the
east but it doesn't look safe to navigate.  Maybe there is a bridge or slow
shallow point up north at which you can cross it.  Maybe not.

sherwood19@sherwood.title: The End
sherwood19@sherwood.description:
The moral of the story here is that everything that glitters isn't
always gold.  In case you haven't figured it out yet....You're DEAD!!!!

sherwood6@sherwood.title: Road to Sherwood Forest
sherwood6@sherwood.description:
You have entered a very dense forest.  The trees tower over you,
blocking but only a little sunlight by which you can make out a path to
the north and to the west.

sherwood33@sherwood.title: Under the Pine Trees
sherwood33@sherwood.description:
You stand under many pine trees that block out the sun.  The path
continues to the north.

sherwood23@sherwood.title: Rutted Path
sherwood23@sherwood.description:
The path here is very rough.  You fall several times trying to
make your way north.  There appear to be eyes peaking from the brush.  You
frantically search but turn up nothing.  The path continues to the north.

sherwood25@sherwood.title: Under the Elms
sherwood25@sherwood.description:
You stand under very thick Elm trees.  The path you are traveling on
is more like a trail now.  It doesn't appear that too many people have ventured
down this road.  And maybe they had a good reason.

sherwood22@sherwood.title: Beaten Path
sherwood22@sherwood.description:
You continue to travel along the beaten path.  The brush grows thick
along each side of the road.  The trees are thin allowing for plenty of light.
This lightens your mood as you grow concerned about traveling so deep into the
forest.

sherwood15@sherwood.title: Dead End
sherwood15@sherwood.description:
Ooops......  You seem to have come across a Dead End.
And the DEAD END seems to be correct in more than one sense.  You suddenly
find yourself zapped from the realms of Infinity.  You Have DIED!

sherwood16@sherwood.title: Road to Wealth
sherwood16@sherwood.description:
You have chosen the right path.  This is the road to fame and fortune.
The trees are happy and friendly and the sun is shining bright down through 
the bright greens leaves of the various trees.  The road continues happily
to the north.

sherwood30@sherwood.title: Under the Thorn Apple Trees
sherwood30@sherwood.description:
You stand under many thorn apple trees that block out the sun.  The
path continues to the north.

sherwood7@sherwood.title: Trampled Path
sherwood7@sherwood.description:
You are on a heavily worn path.  It looks as if many a wagon has 
traveled through here.  The trees thin here allowing the bright sunlight to
shine down.  A tiny rabbit scurries through the bushes but he is too fast for
you.  The path continues to the north.

sherwood32@sherwood.title: Under the Fig Trees
sherwood32@sherwood.description:
You stand under many fig trees that block out the sun.  The path
continues to the north.

sherwood4@sherwood.title: West Fork
sherwood4@sherwood.description:
You are traveling on a paved road, making the journey quite easy.
The road continues west into a dense forest.  You sense danger, and prepare 
yourself for what lies ahead.  What ever that may be.

sherwood27@sherwood.title: Under the Cottonwood Trees
sherwood27@sherwood.description:
You stand under many cottonwood trees that block out the sun.  The path
continues to the north.

sherwood8@sherwood.title: Worn Path
sherwood8@sherwood.description:
You have entered a small clearing of the sorts.  There is a wagon 
sitting off the path to the north.  There is some kind of contraption there.
It looks like it's brewing up some kind of magical potion or something.  Maybe 
you can talk the owner, into parting with some of his brew.

sherwood14@sherwood.title: Dismal Forest
sherwood14@sherwood.description:
Oh no!  You have reached a very dark dismal part of the forest.
You do not feel safe here, and wish to get out of here as soon as possible.
There is the intersection back to the east, but there is also a very nice path
leading to the south

sherwood26@sherwood.title: Under the Popular Trees
sherwood26@sherwood.description:
You stand under many populuar trees that block out the sun.  The path
continues to the north.

hut1@sherwood.title: Ramshackle Hut
hut1@sherwood.description:
As you enter, the ceiling beam crashes down beside you.  Whew! You would
have died if it had hit you.

sherwood17@sherwood.title: On the Road
sherwood17@sherwood.description:
You can't help but to break out into song.  The one that comes to mind 
goes something like, "On the road again, just can't wait to get on the road
again..."  You can't remember who sang it, but you still gotta love it.

sherwood24@sherwood.title: Corner
sherwood24@sherwood.description:
You have reached yet another turn in the road.  The trees grow dense
to the west.  They are ominous and block all sunlight from reaching the ground.
You stand here trying to muster up the courage to venture on.  You look toward
the trees and a shiver runs up your spine.  You know that if you continue.
There is no coming back.  It is all or nothing.  What are you a man or mouse?

hut3@sherwood.title: Ramshackle Hut
hut3@sherwood.description:
As you enter, the ceiling beam starts to fall, then catches on something.
Maybe this will hold together for a little bit longer.

sherwood3@sherwood.title: North Fork
sherwood3@sherwood.description:
The road stretches wide and long.  The trees on the side of the road
are ominous, but friendly enough.  The path is well worn, probably indicating
that it is not a rough one, but don't let that give you peace of mind.

hut2@sherwood.title: Ramshackle Hut
hut2@sherwood.description:
As you enter, the ceiling beam crashes down on you.  It smashes your head.
You are dead.

sherwood11@sherwood.title: Under the Oaks
sherwood11@sherwood.description:
You are standing under oak trees.  You look up to admire their beauty.
When a passing European Swallow flys by and defacates on your face, you
frantically look around for a sink to wash your face, when you suddenly realize
that you are in sherwood forest.  I guess you will have to walk around with
bird feces on your face.

sherwood12@sherwood.title: Turn in Path
sherwood12@sherwood.description:
The path turns west.  You definitely feel like you are getting
somewhere now.  You know it won't be long before a great adventure falls
upon you.  You shiver with anticipation.

sherwood2@sherwood.title: East Fork
sherwood2@sherwood.description:
This is the road to a great adventure full of surpises, monsters, 
and lots of adventure.  This is not for the 'weak of heart' or strength.  
On each side of the road are trees that seem to reach out for you trying to
pull you into their twisted webs of branches.

sherwood1@sherwood.title: Gateway
sherwood1@sherwood.description:
You are standing at the Gateway to adventure.  There are three paths.
Each path has a different adventure and each a different destiny.  Those
who choose to enter must be willing to face the consequences of the choices
they make.

sherwood28@sherwood.title: Under the Maple Trees
sherwood28@sherwood.description:
You stand under many Maple trees that block out the sun.  The path
continues to the north.

stacy@sherwood.name: stacy
stacy@sherwood.description: Merryman Stacy is following Merryman Greg around as always.

sheriff@sherwood.name: sheriff
sheriff@sherwood.description: The Sheriff is here picking out the spot at which to bury you.

mike@sherwood.name: mike
mike@sherwood.description: Merryman Mike is here mumbling about not being a farmer.

marian@sherwood.name: marian
marian@sherwood.description: Maid Marian is here trying to catch of glimpse of your butt.

jason@sherwood.name: jason
jason@sherwood.description: Merryman Jason is here complaining about his newest ailment.

emmy@sherwood.name: emmy
emmy@sherwood.examine:
Emmy is a little girl with big brown eyes, and dark brown hair. You 
wouldn't want to attack her, now would you?
emmy@sherwood.description: Emmy is here eating a peach and giggling.

greg@sherwood.name: greg
greg@sherwood.description: Merryman Greg is telling Merryman Stacy about his new obsession.

lars@sherwood.name: lars
lars@sherwood.description: Merryman Lars is here, puking after completing the Century Club.

little@sherwood.name: little
little@sherwood.description: Little John stands here practicing his dodge, parry, thrust, and spin.

scott@sherwood.name: scott
scott@sherwood.description: Merryman Scott is here, spitting in his little sisters mouth.

sil@sherwood.name: sil
sil@sherwood.description: Merryman Sil is here awaiting Amy's next command.

friar@sherwood.name: friar
friar@sherwood.description: Friar Tuck sits here protecting his precious brew.

robin@sherwood.name: robin
robin@sherwood.description: The famed Robin of Hood stands here, leading his merrymen.

tim@sherwood.name: tim
tim@sherwood.description: Merryman Tim is here anxiously awaiting his weekly drive home.

dan@sherwood.name: dan
dan@sherwood.description: Merryman Dan is saying, "You just better give it back!"

butch@sherwood.name: butch
butch@sherwood.description: Merryman Butch is here kickboxing and antogonized Merryman Chris.

chad@sherwood.name: chad
chad@sherwood.description: Merryman Chad is sitting here playing with his lucky boiling sticks.

jim@sherwood.name: jim
jim@sherwood.description: Jim is here on his watch.
